statements: SELECT * FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_type FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns
SELECT appliance_type, usage_hours FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns WHERE usage_hours > 100
SELECT appliance_type, AVG(usage_hours) AS average_usage FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns GROUP BY appliance_type
SELECT * FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns ORDER BY appliance_type ASC, usage_hours DESC
SELECT appliance_type, last_maintenance_date FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns WHERE appliance_id < 10
SELECT * FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT appliance_type, SUM(usage_hours) AS total_usage FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns GROUP BY appliance_type
SELECT appliance_type, COUNT(*) AS total_appliances FROM ApplianceUsagePatterns GROUP BY appliance_type HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2
SELECT * FROM appliance_usage
SELECT appliance_id, usage_category, usage_hours, last_maintenance_date FROM appliance_usage ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT appliance_id, usage_category FROM appliance_usage WHERE usage_hours > 100
SELECT maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_log
SELECT log_id, maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM appliance_usage WHERE usage_hours > 50;
SELECT appliance_id, usage_category FROM appliance_usage WHERE usage_category = 'Kitchen';
SELECT appliance_id, usage_category, usage_hours FROM appliance_usage ORDER BY appliance_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(usage_hours) AS average_hours FROM appliance_usage;
SELECT a.appliance_id, a.usage_category, m.maintenance_description FROM appliance_usage a JOIN maintenance_log m ON a.appliance_id = m.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM appliance_usage;
SELECT appliance_name, usage_hours FROM appliance_usage ORDER BY usage_hours DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, last_maintenance_date FROM appliance_usage WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT appliance_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM appliance_usage JOIN maintenance_history ON appliance_usage.id = maintenance_history.appliance_id;
SELECT appliance_name, lifespan_years, predicted_lifetime_years FROM appliance_usage JOIN device_lifespans ON appliance_usage.id = device_lifespans.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM appliance_usage;
SELECT appliance_name, usage_hours FROM appliance_usage ORDER BY usage_hours DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, lifespan_years FROM appliance_usage JOIN device_lifespans ON appliance_usage.id = device_lifespans.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT appliance_name, maintenance_date FROM appliance_usage JOIN maintenance_history ON appliance_usage.id = maintenance_history.appliance_id ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM appliance_data;
SELECT appliance_name, usage_hours FROM appliance_data WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT appliance_name, last_maintenance_date FROM appliance_data ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM appliance_sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_value > 50;

SELECT appliance_data.appliance_name, appliance_predictions.prediction_date, appliance_predictions.predicted_issue FROM appliance_data INNER JOIN appliance_predictions ON appliance_data.appliance_id = appliance_predictions.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM appliance_data;
SELECT appliance_name, usage_hours FROM appliance_data WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_name, maintenance_type FROM appliance_data JOIN appliance_maintenance ON appliance_data.appliance_id = appliance_maintenance.appliance_id;
SELECT appliance_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM appliance_data JOIN appliance_sensors ON appliance_data.appliance_id = appliance_sensors.appliance_id WHERE sensor_value > 0.5;

SELECT prediction_id, appliance_name, predicted_issue FROM appliance_predictions JOIN appliance_data ON appliance_predictions.appliance_id = appliance_data.appliance_id WHERE prediction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM appliance_usage;
SELECT appliance_name, usage_hours FROM appliance_usage WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT appliance_name, last_maintenance_date FROM appliance_usage ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, brand, warranty_period FROM appliance_models WHERE warranty_period IS NOT NULL;
SELECT appliance_type, description FROM appliance_types WHERE type_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM appliance_usage;
SELECT appliance_name, usage_hours FROM appliance_usage WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT model_name, brand, warranty_period FROM appliance_models WHERE warranty_period IS NOT NULL;
SELECT appliance_type, description FROM appliance_types WHERE description LIKE '%energy%';
SELECT appliance_name, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM appliance_usage INNER JOIN maintenance_records ON appliance_usage.appliance_id = maintenance_records.appliance_id;
